value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC STRATEGY - GuMiho Loves Battlecruisers!

In this Terran versus Zerg, Rogue decides to respond with a focus on Corruptors and eventually Infestors. value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.

value.title: This is why SC2 isn’t played on 200% hit points | PiG's Laboratory - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged StarCraft 2 pros to play with 200% hit points while everything else remained the same. The results: some units get crazy OP. You can check this out for yourself using the "PiG's Laboratory" mod created by nice_username  If you want to see what 50% hit points

value.title: This is why SC2 isn’t played on 50% hit points | PiG's Lab - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: As part of PiG's Laboratory, I challenged StarCraft 2 pros to play with only 50% hit points - on everything! We get to witness how quickly everything dies.
